revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Classic attack}} '''A_WraithMelee'''
(''no parameter'')
Has 86% chance of a performing a melee attack dealing 2-16 points of damage. The amount of damage dealt will, in turn, be used to heal the calling actor. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Wraith}} and derived classes.
